title: Stocks in the news: Adani Group stocks, TechM, NMDC, KPIT Tech, TTML and autos - Economic Times
content: Stocks in the news: Adani Group stocks, TechM, NMDC, KPIT Tech, TTML and autos  Economic Times
description: HDFC, Adani Green, Dabur, Adani Total Gas, Dabur, Tata Consumer, Jubilant Foodworks, Indian Overseas Bank, Zee Entertainment, and M&M Finance are among the companies that will announce their December quarter results today
